text: Usakaham kasaiko sipharisa lagdaina, kintu usako matra jasala'i usale anumati di'eko cha. Yahamsam'ma ki jaba unaka hrdayaharubata ghabarahata samapta garincha, ta tiniharule sodhchanh ki ‘‘timro palanakartale ke bhan'yo’’? (Pharistaharule) javapha dinchan ki ‘‘satya bhaneko cha! Ra tyo atyanta ucca ra mahan cha’’
